ygData.subject: Re: goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: {<Ah, yes, half elf druids are great, even if I am as stupid as an unequipped wood elf ;)> Hmmmmm... not sure if a care much for this crack!!!
ygData.messageBody:
{<Ah, yes, half elf druids are great, even if
I am as stupid as an unequipped wood elf
;)><br><br> Hmmmmm... not sure if a care much for this
crack!!! haha}<br><br>Ah, but it's true . . . I am one
stupid half elf . . . maybe you're just special,
Xela.<br>At lvl 34, with pretty decent equip, I'm at 131 wis
. . . oh, poor me. :)<br>But I love being a druid.
I can go pretty much ANYWHERE . . . gotta love
those ports . . . wizzies would be great for that
reason, except they don't get SoW or scale of wolf--my
lifeblood.<br><br>I agree about quests. I do any I can find, but
mostly only with my alts. Kan's too busy being begged
for ports and SoWs. hehe <br><br>~Kan, who is spoiled
by being a druid. Maybe that's why her alts are all
15 and lower. ;)
